Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110411 Lightning/1.0b2 Thunderbird/3.1.9

There should be an "Archive Settings" tab, similar to the "Retention Policy" tab, in the properties of each folder.  That way, I can choose to archive (say) my Sent mail to a different place than my Inbox mail.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Right click Properties on a folder.
2. Look for a tab that says "Archive Settings".
Actual Results:  
There is no such tab.

Expected Results:  
There would be a tab allowing me to override the default archive folder for the account.

comments.raw_text: It would make sense to end up with archived sent mail in a different place than other mail, especially. But I like the idea of generalizing the ability to control how email archives are set by folder.
